channel.title: Master Key Logger v.3 and LITE v.14
channel.description:
[center][b][size=15pt]Master Key Logger HEAVY and LITE[/size][/b] by Ron[/center]
The new version is out! It's built on top of the LITE version with the HEAVY version's features! It's in beta right now because I don't have enough time to test everything. If you find a bug please post it! :)
[b]As of Aug 11, 2008. No bugs have been reported. No bugs have been found by me. I can say it's a stable version now. It's been out for 6 months and many people have tried it. No bugs is good news![/b]
[b]Features:[/b]
[ul][*]Literal translation of keys. Such as if you typed in 'beul' then hit backspace 3 times and typed in 'lue', this will show 'blue'. [*]Highlighter which highlights key phrases such as 'www.', '.com', 'lol', 'porn', 'xxx', etc. You may add your own things to highlight! [*]Ability to send keystrokes to a website if the website is added to SCAR's firewall settings or if SCAR's firewall is disabled. [*]For the web page freaks, the XHTML in the page is perfectly formatted... lol. Not much of a feature, but what the hell. [*]Watch clipboard. Every time a person copies text, this script will take a note of it and display what was copied and at what time. [*]If a common combination of keys is pressed such as Ctrl + C, it will be shown in Literal Keys as a note. Something like Copied Text! [*]Password protection with password recovery saved in the same location as the key log file's path.[/ul]
[b]Lite features only but also included in MKL v.3:[/b]
[ul][*]Records abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789 `-=[]\;',./ [*]Records Shift, Alt, Ctrl, Esc, Tab, Enter, and ESC. [*]Records when Shift/Alt/Ctrl was pressed and when it was released. [*]Records all FKeys (F1, F2, etc) and Arrow Keys (UP, DOWN, etc). [*]Records keys on the numpad (as of SCAR 3.11). [*]Time stamps the script at beginning and end and tells you how long the script ran for. [*]Saves keystrokes to a .html file to easily view them.[/ul]
[quote="Haxor62"]very usefull and highly recomended[/quote] Thank you. :D
Enjoy my keylogger! If you find any problems or bugs or any suggestions or even comments. PLEASE POST!
13 People have downloaded KeyLogger.scar v.1 before I added the runtime error fix. 78 More people have downloaded KeyLogger.scar v.1 after I added the runtime error fix. 773 number of people have downloaded Master Key Logger HEAVY v.2 Beta since I just released it on Mopar. 285 number of people have downloaded Master Key Logger LITE before I added the current version on both Mopar and SRL.
~Ron

@Ron wrote:

You don’t. You download the script, open it in scar, and run the script to keylog your own computer. The entire point of this script is to see what goes on on YOUR computer.

http://www.freddy1990.com
